info.name: Document Freedom Day - Poster
info.description: This is the poster of Document Freedom Day campaign 2014. It is double-sided (front in English, back in six languages) and it is available in A2 and A3.
info.languages: A2 - Front in English - Back Multilingual, A3 - Front in English - Back Multilingual
info.printed: Yes. A3 & A2, six languages on the back of the poster: English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Turkish
info.author: FSFE
